tabs.title: Work Experience
tabs.content: I spent a decade as a journalist before becoming a travel writer and leading tours in Africa. I authored a travel book and launched a travel startup. My passion for programming led me to pursue formal education and start my career as a front-end developer.

tabs.title: Education
tabs.content: I hold a bachelor’s degree in Journalism and a master’s degree in Communications, with my thesis focused on social media and the role of Twitter in public opinion. Currently, I am studying Front-End Development at BCIT.
